mergewith.fragment: <distribution spec="bdmmprime.util.priors.ZeroExcludingPrior" id='$(thisparam)CanonicalPrior.t:$(n)' x='@$(thisparam)Canonical.t:$(n)'> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.OneOnX"/> </distribution> <operator id='$(thisparam)CanonicalScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@$(thisparam)Canonical.t:$(n)"/>

connect.if: inposterior(BDMMPrime.t:$(n)) and inposterior(Tree.t:$(n)) and inposterior($(thisparam)Canonical.t:$(n)) and inposterior(CanonicalBDMMPrimeParameterization.t:$(n))

mergewith.fragment: <distribution spec="bdmmprime.util.priors.ZeroExcludingPrior" id='$(thisparam)EpiPrior.t:$(n)' x='@$(thisparam)Epi.t:$(n)'> <distr spec="beast.base.inference.distribution.OneOnX"/> </distribution> <operator id='$(thisparam)EpiScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@$(thisparam)Epi.t:$(n)"/>

connect.if: inposterior(BDMMPrime.t:$(n)) and inposterior(Tree.t:$(n)) and inposterior($(thisparam)Epi.t:$(n)) and inposterior(EpiBDMMPrimeParameterization.t:$(n))

mergewith.fragment: <distribution spec="bdmmprime.util.priors.ZeroExcludingPrior" id='$(thisparam)FBDPrior.t:$(n)' x='@$(thisparam)FBD.t:$(n)'> <distr spec="beast.math.distributions.OneOnX"/> </distribution> <operator id='$(thisparam)FBDScaler.t:$(n)' spec='ScaleOperator' scaleFactor="0.75" weight="3" parameter="@$(thisparam)FBD.t:$(n)"/>

connect.if: inposterior(BDMMPrime.t:$(n)) and inposterior(Tree.t:$(n)) and inposterior($(thisparam)FBD.t:$(n)) and inposterior(FBDBDMMPrimeParameterization.t:$(n))

mergewith.subtemplate:
<parameterization id="CanonicalBDMMPrimeParameterization.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.CanonicalParameterization"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <typeSet idref="typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <birthRate id="birthRateSVCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="birthRateCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0"/> </birthRate> <birthRateAmongDemes id="birthRateAmongDemesSMCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineMatrixParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="birthRateAmongDemesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0"/> </birthRateAmongDemes> <deathRate id="deathRateSVCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="deathRateCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0"/> </deathRate> <migrationRate id="migrationRateSMCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineMatrixParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="migrationRateCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0"/> </migrationRate>
<samplingRate id="samplingRateSVCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="samplingRateCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.1"/> </samplingRate> <removalProb id="removalProbSVCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="removalProbCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0" upper="1.0" estimate="false"/> </removalProb>
<rhoSampling id="rhoSamplingProbTPCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.TimedParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> </rhoSampling> </parameterization>
<param id="birthRateChangeTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="birthRateAmongDemesChangeTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="deathRateChangeTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="migrationRateChangeTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="samplingRateChangeTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="removalProbChangeTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/>
<param id="rhoSamplingProbCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <param id="rhoSamplingProbTimesCanonical.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.0" estimate="false"/>

<parameterization id="EpiBDMMPrimeParameterization.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.EpiParameterization"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <typeSet idref="typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <R0 id="R0SVEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="R0Epi.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0"/> </R0> <R0AmongDemes id="R0AmongDemesSMEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineMatrixParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="R0AmongDemesEpi.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </R0AmongDemes> <becomeUninfectiousRate id="becomeUninfectiousRateSVEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="becomeUninfectiousRateEpi.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0"/> </becomeUninfectiousRate> <migrationRate id="migrationRateSMEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineMatrixParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="migrationRateEpi.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </migrationRate> <samplingProportion id="samplingProportionSVEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="samplingProportionEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.1" lower="0.0" upper="1.0"/> </samplingProportion> <removalProb id="removalProbSVEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="removalProbEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0" upper="1.0" estimate="false"/> </removalProb>
<rhoSampling id="rhoSamplingProbTPEpi.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.TimedParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> </rhoSampling> </parameterization>
<param id="R0ChangeTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="R0AmongDemesChangeTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="becomeUninfectiousRateChangeTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="migrationRateChangeTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="samplingProportionChangeTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="removalProbChangeTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/>
<param id="rhoSamplingProbEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.0" estimate="false"/> <param id="rhoSamplingProbTimesEpi.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.0" estimate="false"/>

<parameterization id="FBDBDMMPrimeParameterization.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.FBDParameterization"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <typeSet idref="typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <diversificationRate id="diversificationRateSVFBD.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="diversificationRateFBD.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0" lower="1.0"/> </diversificationRate> <diversificationRateAmongDemes id="diversificationRateAmongDemesSMFBD.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineMatrixParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="diversificationRateAmongDemesFBD.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </diversificationRateAmongDemes> <turnover id="turnoverSVFBD.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="turnoverFBD.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0" lower="0" upper="1"/> </turnover> <migrationRate id="migrationRateSMFBD.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineMatrixParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="migrationRateFBD.t:$(n)" spec='beast.core.parameter.RealParameter' value="1.0" estimate="false"/> </migrationRate> <samplingProportion id="samplingProportionSVFBD.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.SkylineVectorParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> <skylineValues id="samplingProportionFBD.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="0.1" lower="0" upper="1"/> </samplingProportion>
<rhoSampling id="rhoSamplingProbTPFBD.t:$(n)" spec="bdmmprime.parameterization.TimedParameter" typeSet="@typeSetBDMMPrime.t:$(n)" timesAreAges="true"> <processLength idref="originBDMMPrime.t:$(n)"/> </rhoSampling> </parameterization>
<param id="diversificationRateChangeTimesFBD.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="diversificationRateAmongDemesChangeTimesFBD.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="turnoverChangeTimesFBD.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="migrationRateChangeTimesFBD.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/> <param id="samplingProportionChangeTimesFBD.t:$(n)" spec="beast.core.parameter.RealParameter" value="1.0" lower="0.0"/>
